title: Understanding GST for Small Businesses
content:
GST can be complex for small businesses. This guide explains key concepts and compliance requirements.

For more information, check the [GST Council website](https://www.gst.gov.in).

title: Tax Planning Strategies for Startups
content:
Startups face unique tax challenges. This article covers effective tax planning strategies.

Learn more at [Startup India](https://www.startupindia.gov.in).
